website_summaries.verdict: Made to look good and last. If you want quality, comfort, style and value, you won't find a better men's dress shoe on the market today.
pros: An attractive shoe with a traditional style
Features footbed padding that makes the shoe comfortable for hours of wear
cons: They don't run true-to-size, and most men find that they need a size or so smaller than their actual shoe size

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if shoes this expensive should look like this after a day
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for my wedding day. I am not sure if this is normally what leather soles look like after one day of wearing but its kind of disappointing. Not sure how well they will hold up in the long run considering this.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: I was also dismayed by the poor quality of the leather and workmanship which do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have come to learn after some internet research that Allen Edmonds are typically narrow in construction. So after I returned this product, I ordered the next wider size from Zappo's as they weren't available here, and they were still too narrow. I was also dismayed by the poor quality of the leather and workmanship which do not justify a steep $395.00 price tag. Supposedly AE does not have a quality control department; quality is adjusted according to customer feed back and returns. Let's see if my two returns create an uptick in that area.
customer_reviews.author: shawn benoit

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but I feel these are Allen Edmonds seconds ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but I feel these are Allen Edmonds seconds (outlet sold at a discount shoe due to cosmetic issues) being sold as firsts. Some slight discoloration and the sole stitching being outside the leather groove leads me to believe this.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: My first pair came from a thrift store...
customer_reviews.text: Since my first pair was used my feet started to hurt and I had to get new ones. When I found out a new pair was $300 I was surprised, my thrift store pair was only $8. But even then they were the best shoes I ever wore so when needing a fresh pair I knew it was worth it. Bought my first brand new pair and I'm glad I did. Update: A few weeks later and I've got them broken in. Best shoes ever. I've got another pair in my cart just so I can order a back-up pair whenever they go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: OB7DEV

customer_reviews.title: Stay true to your size, just order wider.
customer_reviews.text: I'm holding out on the fifth star for now. This shoe seems very high in quality. The stitching all around seems fine. I would note that I just wore them around in my house this evening (just arrived). Based on the recommendation from AE I bought this in 11E. I mostly wear a 10.5 E. They were tight on the width. The length would be too long if my toes could get up there. I'm going to send them back and order the 10.5 3E Please know that I seldom wear dress shoes. My feet were slipping on the carpet as I walked; this is likely expected until they are broken in.
customer_reviews.author: KTC

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe, But priced Too High.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Virtually no break-in period. The front of the shoe or the toes slants slightly upwards, which I’m on the fence about. I bought these because I like the stability and support of leather soles, which are difficult to find in a shoe; however I feel I paid too much ($245) for these features, and I don’t see any other extra benefit such as longer wear than non-leather soled shoes.
customer_reviews.author: William Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds shoes, awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Wear it to my work, formal affairs, attending church services, shoes really awesome. The only shortcoming is that the pair didn't come on its original box and not on their Allen Edmonds shoe bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the quality of the shoe is readily apparent from the fine craftsmanship to the rich smell of leather. I had some reservations about purchasing an expensive dress shoe online, but I am very glad I did. Secondly, the sizing of this shoe is not the same for any other shoe I have ever purchased. As one reviewer previously stated, I always purchase a 9.5 (e.g. NIKE) but as recommended by other reviewers I purchased a 8.5 Allen Edmonds Men's McAllister and they fit perfectly. Highly recommend this shoe to anyone looking for a shoe built to last and is appropriate for graduate school or any other business setting.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Heel separating after 10 days!
customer_reviews.text: The heel has started to come off the sole within 45 days after receiving the shoes. I've worn the shoes less than 10 times. The return policy will not let me return or replace them. $400 to wear shoes for 45 days before they fall apart = Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: the best shoes money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are expensive, but worth it, great quality, the leather cut is really high degree of craftsmanship, made in the USA, they fit are great maybe cause my feet are some how narrow, they run true to size and I could wear them all day long for my weeding. I highly recommend these shoes with the right maintenance last at least one decade or more.
customer_reviews.author: salvador h yepis

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, color is rich and tasteful
customer_reviews.text: When one is tired of dark brown and black shoes.... Here is a new color for you. Subtle tint of merlot adds to an impressive collection of dress shoes. The key is to buy Allen Edmonds in sale.... Put it on alert and a price in the $230 range is possible and worthwhile. Solid built and style. I now own a pair of black, walnut, merlot, and brown dress shoes (purchased in that order).... The collection is complete and I am prepared to take on the world.
customer_reviews.author: krs

customer_reviews.title: Completely as promised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent first quality Allen Edmunds. I have worn these shows for years. I have found nothing better. In an office environment they last me 5 years or more wearing them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt Review

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes, and you can tell by looking at them that they will last. They are a bit stiff and run large. I typically wear a 11-11.5 and I had to get a 10.5 in these. They are also a bit narrow. Maybe I am just getting fat. Anyway, these shoes are for any businessman, attorney, or anyone who likes classic, good-looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe! My last five pair of dress shoes have been Edmund-Allen. With proper care I anticipate them lasting for years. I use them daily for work with comfort. An extra nicety is the storage bags they come with. The cost point is a little on the steep side compared to my Johnston Murphy shoes, but when I can find a 6.5 D in men's dress shoes I have to take advantage; it is not a prevalent size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Total ripoff. These shoes are horribly uncomfortable. The heel started peeling off within a month. Had to return them. Replacement shoes have worn poorly and are painful to wear. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Prestwich

customer_reviews.title: A high quality shoe. Also looks very stylish. ...
customer_reviews.text: A high quality shoe. Also looks very stylish. I found the sizing to be precise and accurate. The leather is very stiff initially, so you may have to wear it for a few weeks before it loosens up.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fine shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow and long foot with high arches. I thought I was clumsy and unstable. Finding shoes that fit made a difference. Allen Edmonds makes a product with fine workmanship, superb materials, excellent fit and finish with good engineering along with width sizing. Highly recommended in all regards.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bryon Verhaeghe Ltd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed to be factory 2nds with noticeable normallysold at a more steep discount.
customer_reviews.author: P A F

customer_reviews.title: Factory second advertised as regular priced Allen Edmonds, if ...
customer_reviews.text: Factory second advertised as regular priced Allen Edmonds, if you pay $400 for a pair of Allen Edmonds, you should get a pair of the latter. Not factory seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Olas

customer_reviews.title: Once broken in they fit comfortably well. My feet don't tire in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that the shoes would fit the way they did prior to breaking them in. Once broken in they fit comfortably well. My feet don't tire in these shoes. They're very stylish and durable and they're hand made here in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are superb. I have a similar pair with a rubber sole. It lasted about 12 years with Allen Edmonds re-crafting it 2-3 times... just like new.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Allen-Edmonds Men's McAllister Oxfords,Black Custom
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great but unfortunately the shoe was too narrow. At this price, I did not want to take the chance and hope that it would loosen up over time. I returned the shoe for a 3E to see if it would fit better. I will update the review as soon as I receive the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Donald N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe! 5th Allen Edmond shoe I own. ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe! 5th Allen Edmond shoe I own. I wear a size 12 in Nikes tennis shoes, a size 11 in Redwing Heritage Boots, and a size 11.5 in Allen Edmonds.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 10-D. They were a bit small, but 10 1/2 is perfect. These are awesome shoes, although a bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: SkipWeeks

customer_reviews.title: Simply great dress shoes
customer_reviews.text: Classic shoes of high quality. I am impressed with every aspect of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying on Amazon was Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes. I was a little hesitant to buy on Amazon, but the shoes were exactly right on. I have other AE so I knew my size and fit. Two day shipping beats AE and the price was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classic shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to upgrade my attire. Man, they work for that. The craftsmanship is incredible with great attention to detail. Fitment is terrific and the shoes are getting more and more comfortable as I wear them. Everyone commented on how great these shoes look. I wore them with gray pants and I must say that is a terrific combination. I am very happy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Derek Gates

customer_reviews.title: New AE's
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shoe, but already have this model. One of the best AE has to offer at that price. I misordered so returned for another pair. This time, I ordered the AE Vernon model in Saddle Brown Calf. They were a perfect fit and comfortable the first time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M. METZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box and look great too.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds has never disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: As always, Allen Edmonds shoes are of excellent quality and look great.
customer_reviews.author: David Q. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Class
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well (might run just a hair on the narrow side), look great and appear as if they will last a very long time. I would make sure to purchase some shoe trees to extend the life.
customer_reviews.author: Sailfast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicate and beautiful shoes, is very comfortable to wear comfortable, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Meltaway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dress show.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of AE McAllister Wing Tips in 1994, and these are my second pair (Dec 2014). Anytime you can wear a shoe for 20 years, no reason to any other type. These fit great, look great, and are the perfect dress show.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Corder

customer_reviews.title: great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first pair of shoes purchased on-line.... couldn't have worked out better!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Morar

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes. Don't overthink it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on a pair of shoes. What I had in mind was half the price. I thought I could find similar quality shoes for the price I spent 15yrs ago. Not happening. The workmanship on these shoes is awesome. They fit true to my size. Fit was comfortable snug. I'm still in the break in process as this is the second week. Been wearing them full days and my feet do not hurt end of day. I'm really looking forward to when they have formed to my feet. I'm guessing maybe another month? Will not overthink my next Allen Edmonds purchase. Plan on buying another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Rawalt

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Most dress shoes are a little big. I usually wear an 8.5 and order dress shoes in 8. I think these are true to size, so they are a tad snug. Like most dress shoes these will soften once broken in so I am not concerned at all. These are the finest pair of shoes I have owned. The attention to detail and the quality of the leather are second to none. I love these shoes. I recommend any man who seeks style and is not afraid to spend get a QUALITY pair of dress shoes. These are a fine choice. I love the wing tip style and perforations pattern. GREAT SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Many used pairs being sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: I had to order 10 pairs before i found one that looked new. Many of the pairs had noticeably been worn, or had some pretty bad defects. I don't know if this is an issue with Amazon or with Allen Edmond's quality control. I was able to get these less then retail, so I was more willing to keep searching for a good pair, but would never pay full price for these. The shoes themselves are very comfortable and look great. We be wearing these for my wedding in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: MikeGainesville

customer_reviews.title: Rock steady.
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Allen Edmonds customer for over 30 years. I know what to expect, and they live up to my expectations. Well done, AE.
customer_reviews.author: Bavarian Bird

customer_reviews.title: Make better
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good but to narrow, they also make a lot of noise when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Just a bit tight where the shoes lace up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes! Very versatile in Merlot color
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes! Very versatile in Merlot color, can wear with casual suits, dress slacks or chinos or quality dark denim. Very comfortable and handsome, right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Shane Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds WingTip
customer_reviews.text: 10.5 US. The same size I wear in almost all other shoes except some boots. Shoe fit is right on. Quality and craftsmanship is top of the line at least from my perspective. Good price on amazon. Looks like I'll be in the Allen Edmonds market in the future. I always prefer to buy a quality USA made product when available. Looks like these shoes will last and serve a long time. With the leather sole its pretty much a fair weather shoe but that's ok. I'll look to something else when the weather is rough.
customer_reviews.author: JoeAverage-User

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They will probably get more comfortable as they are new shoes currently.
customer_reviews.author: buyerD

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but it was not large enough over the top of my foot. The laces could not close the gap. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, style and fit. Ordered 11.5eee and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: van

customer_reviews.title: perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: Prefect shoes right out of the box! Allen Edmonds are the only shoes I order online because the quality and fit are always right.
customer_reviews.author: seajudge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dresss shoes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand of dress shoes, they fit like a glove. You can really tell a difference when compared to other dress shoes, these are made with such high quality, they will last for a long time, even with daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky O.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!!! Over the past 10 years I have owned four pair... each pair is good for about 5 years with resole job about every 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: AE Shoes are great, and a great value
customer_reviews.text: These, like all my AE shoes are great. Well made with quality leathers, fully lined, and distinctive in their understated way. The upfront cost of AE shoes may look high but when taken care of correctly they will last many people well over a decade and still look new. As an added bonus these are some of the last shoes to be made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: DeP

customer_reviews.title: Classy and fine footwear
customer_reviews.text: What a deal. Looks first quality to me and I have about 6 pairs of AE from the AE store in Charlotte, NC.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great pair
customer_reviews.text: The shoes run a little large in terms of width but that was no issue for me. I love this pair and plan to wear it for a long time (like most of my Allen Edmonds) =)
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of shoes. I get compliments every time I wear them. Comfortable right out of the box. Sizing on this last can be a little tricky, so I would suggest trying them on in a store before ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brand new; no issues.
customer_reviews.text: My shoes arrived new; they were in Allen Edmonds shoe bags in the original Allen Edmonds box. They show no signs of wear and tear and were roughly $250. Not too bad when compared with the in-store price of $335. I haven't had a chance to wear them yet, but they are very obviously a high quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: rfmiller11

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable - Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I rate the shoes as 5 stars, since they are about as comfortable as it gets. The leather is more of a semi-gloss as opposed to shiny. This is likely due to the softness of the leather and is not an issue. There is some minor wrinkling in the leather above the heel, but I expect this to correct itself as the shoes wear in. Overall, the shoes is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Huge K.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes, love them overall. The width was smaller than what I expected. Normally a wide fits me, in this case it didn't. I needed to go 2E or maybe even 3E
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: High quality well made shoes.The best overall shoes on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hubby likes the shoes and says that they fit well!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Received compliments first time wearing them with Manistee Walnut belt. Leather bottoms which I don't normally buy for a non work shoe. I would buy another pair from amazon, their price was the best as well.
customer_reviews.author: Errol Brown

customer_reviews.title: Panache!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I have ever owned. I cannot recommend these enough. The quality is amazing. The workmanship is superior. I purchased the merlot and I love the color. It goes with a dark suit or a pair of slacks / jeans. I might only recommend getting them a touch wider as if you wear them all day you might want an insert, the leather can be a little tough. Still, great quality for the price and the best looking shoes you may ever own
customer_reviews.author: pinhead

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: LOve the quality of Allend Edmonds. Make sure though that your size is correct. I had to order 3 times to get the right size. As a comparison: - Nike I'm a 9.5 - Cole Haan 9.5 - Allen Edmonds Mcallister 8.5 D - Allen Edmonds Mctavish 8E with a bit of strech cheers
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for his 50th birthday and he couldn't be happier. He gets compliments from everybody, and even I do because I picked them for him. He says they fit like a glove and are the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Abele

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I have worn J-M shoes for years, but these required no break-in to be able to wear them for several hours with no discomfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Allen Edmonds produces high-quality products. Exactly as expected again with this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow foot so I ordered a half size smaller and they fit great. Wonderful quality shoe. I plan on having these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Williamson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of shoes by far!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best shoes I have ever owned. They look and feel great. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loved the shoes! He normally wears a 11.5 but those were a little snug so we went with the 12 and they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ansley B.

customer_reviews.title: quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: good quality dress oxford, i'm happy with the construction quality. No defects in the leather, no signs of prior wear. Fit is good, I'm still working on breaking these in, but plan to wear them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rushing

customer_reviews.title: You will get noticed.
customer_reviews.text: There is definitely some peacocking when you wear these shoes, so you better be ready for the attention! Every time I wear these shoes, they're the first thing people notice about me. The sole is leather and so are the laces. Allen Edmonds paid extreme care to the details of this shoe, and you will be impressed. The color of the shoe is a bit lighter than what you see in the product picture so I would hold off on buying a matching belt until you receive the shoe! The quality is exceptional, and these shoes will probably last you the rest of your life if you take proper care of them!
customer_reviews.author: tally

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is one of a Kind
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship can be found in these shoes. The leather stitch work is one of a kind. I constantly receive compliments Matches my Allan Edmond belt.
customer_reviews.author: Reekoh

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shape
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is nearly perfect. The only thing that I, personally, don't like is the low cut of the opening. They're a very modern shoe, which is great; thin profile, not a huge sole outline. I just wish that it had a higher point around the ankle. In my suit, with a slightly-tapered leg opening, there is still an area where you can see my socks over my ankles :-/. Just wear black/no socks, I guess. 100% made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Jon the Pilot

customer_reviews.title: what you would expect from AE
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Very sharp. I picked these up with the black friday sale at about a 40% discount from the AE website, which was great. One thing should be noted, most of the pictures I found around the internet of these shoes posted by owners seem to have been taken with a flash, which greatly distorts what they look like. (these pictures make the brogue holes look white/bright, while in reality they are black)
customer_reviews.author: Craig Henry

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with my purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes fit...like they were made-to measure! The shape looks great and the leather is extremely supple. I recently bought a pair of AE Larchmont in black. Those do not fit me as well as these. I definitely recommend this to be worn with suits/ slacks of almost any color. Ordered this from Amazon Warehouse as I got a great deal...approx $ 150 off retail price!! I was a little anxious about the condition as it was an open box item. However, my anxiety was unfounded. The shoes are in perfect showroom condition...not a a single mark on the soles or the upper.... Again...extremely happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Sharma

customer_reviews.title: High Quality; Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: High quality all the way around. Sizes are very consistent for all Allen Edmonds models. Fantastic shoe and become very comfortable quickly. Short break in period.
customer_reviews.author: David Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes, but order big
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, but Allen Edmonds shoes are insanely uncomfortable. The bottom of the shoe is as hard as a rock and the "insole" cannot be removed to put in a better insole. The only option is to buy a bigger size and insert an insole above the standard Allen Edmonds material. I have shoes from Johnston & Murphy that are much, much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: cam6389

customer_reviews.title: A bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, but not comfortable at all. I will be more careful about sizes when I buy this brand online.
customer_reviews.author: Haitham Ali Al Zeer

customer_reviews.title: For better quality / price ratio look to Spanish shoe makers
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the money. For better quality / price ratio look to Spanish shoe makers.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Nice but No
customer_reviews.text: Great item but soles have no traction and Leather scratches easily. I don't see these lasting long given the price this is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: altec1

customer_reviews.title: Allen Edmonds McAllister
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are well made and made in the USA which is the best part, but the only thing I dont like and this has to do with Amazon shipping when someone buys a pair of shoes for $250.00 dont just ship it in the the shoe box inside a plastic bag that had holes in it and the shoe box is destroyed but lucky me the shoes are undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Lee Troutman

customer_reviews.title: These small headphones continue the same great sound. Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a huge fan of Koss headphones even going back 40 years when I started work as a radio announcer. These small headphones continue the same great sound. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: William Black

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased with the step I took to make this purchase. I am encouraged to continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil M. Salamah

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are made well however, the width is slightly too wide and the shoes slide when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Osborne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs, black and merlot. The quality of the merlot is surprisingly poor. The sole was uneven at the point where it meets the side of teh shoe and the heal is visibly split! I cannot see paying this much money for this brand when other less expensive ones like Johnston and Murphy are made with equal or better quality. To Boot New York got them beat by a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Thelionking

product_meta.title: Allen Edmonds Men's McAllister Wing Tip
product_meta.description:
The McAllister wing tip from Allen Edmonds exudes stylish sophistication. With its rich leather upper, classic styling, and distinguished perforation detail, this shoe will add the perfect polish to your dress wardrobe. Dust bag included. Founded in 1922, Allen-Edmonds Shoe Corporation manufactures premium men's footwear, accessories, and cedar products using the philosophy of quality, service and integrity. Taking shoemaking to the level of an art form, each pair of Allen-Edmonds shoes are carefully crafted by hand in a process that includes 212 separate production steps. No detail is too small, because supreme quality is the cornerstone of the Allen-Edmonds name. Recraftable

The McAllister wing tip from Allen Edmonds exudes stylish sophistication. With its rich leather upper, classic styling, and distinguished perforation detail, this shoe will add the perfect polish to your dress wardrobe. Dust bag included.

Founded in 1922, Allen-Edmonds Shoe Corporation manufactures premium men's footwear, accessories, and cedar products using the philosophy of quality, service and integrity. Taking shoemaking to the level of an art form, each pair of Allen-Edmonds shoes are carefully crafted by hand in a process that includes 212 separate production steps. No detail is too small, because supreme quality is the cornerstone of the Allen-Edmonds name.

See more
feature_bullets: Luxurious wingtip oxford with decorative broguing, pinking, and piping
360 degree welt construction. Care use Allen Edmonds leather lotion to remove surface residue and to keep leather soft and pliable.
